body:
Parallel graph management and execution in heterogeneous computing.

This PR includes:
- py-pox
- py-multiprocess
- py-ppft
- py-dill

```
o  py-pathos
|\
| |\
| | |\
| | | |\
| | | | |\
| | o | | |  py-ppft
| |/| | | | 
|/|/| | | | 
| | |\ \ \ \
| | | | |_|/
| | | |/| | 
| | | | o |  py-pox
| |_|_|/| | 
|/| |_|/ /
| |/| | | 
| | | | o  py-multiprocess
| |_|_|/| 
|/| |_|/| 
| |/| |/
| | | o  py-dill
| |_|/| 
|/| |/
| |/| 
| o |  py-setuptools
...
```
title: Adding new package: py-pathos (and dependencies)
